references.paper_title: Improved algorithms for linear stochastic bandits
references.reason: This paper is foundational for linear contextual bandits, providing improved algorithms and serving as a basis for many subsequent works, including this one which extends to generalized linear models.

references.paper_title: Instance-wise minimax-optimal algorithms for logistic bandits
references.reason: This work provides instance-optimal algorithms for logistic bandits which are crucial to this paper's methodology of providing similar guarantees for generalized linear models.

references.paper_title: Improved optimistic algorithms for logistic bandits
references.reason: This paper introduces improved algorithms for logistic bandits, enhancing the understanding of regret bounds and contributing significantly to techniques used in handling generalized linear models.

references.paper_title: Jointly efficient and optimal algorithms for logistic bandits
references.reason: This paper further advances the state-of-the-art in logistic bandits by achieving both computational efficiency and optimal regret, which is a key aspect this paper also strives for in the context of generalized linear models.

references.paper_title: Parametric bandits: The generalized linear case
references.reason: This seminal work addresses generalized linear models in the contextual bandit setting, providing the foundation for extending existing results to this class of models.
